sentences.english: Among ethnic groups, Bai , Bouyei and Miao people are also adept at embroidery.
sentences.chinese: 在民族，白族，布依族和苗族人还善于刺绣。

sentences.english: Abstract:The flying songs of Miao nationality have become one kind of code name and symbol of Miao nationality music.
sentences.chinese: 苗族飞歌成了苗族音乐的一种代号和象征。

sentences.english: Abstract:The flying songs of Miao nationality have become one kind of code name and symbol of Miao nationality music.
sentences.chinese: 苗族飞歌成了苗族音乐的一种代号和象征。

sentences.english: Furong Ancient Town Furong Town or Hibiscus Town is located Yongshun County of Western Hunan Tujia and Miao Autonomous Prefecture.
sentences.chinese: 芙蓉古镇位于土家和苗族自治区西部的永顺县。

sentences.english: There are allegations the Hmong are not being properly cared for.
sentences.chinese: 这些都表明，苗族人并没有受到公正的对待。

sentences.english: This village is populated by Khamu, Hmong and Lao Loom people.
sentences.chinese: 这个村庄是由Khamu，苗族，老挝织机人居住。

sentences.english: Fenghuang is a habitat area of Chinese minorities, ethnic Miao and Tujia.
sentences.chinese: 凤凰是土家族和苗族的居住区。

sentences.english: Therefore the recognition to the P. R. China is the highest recognition of Mongolian in Miao ethnic group.
sentences.chinese: 因此对中国国家的认同是苗族蒙人最高级的认同。

sentences.english: Thee Dragon-Boat Festival is the most important celebration of the Miao people, who live alongthe Qingshui Rwerin southeastem Guizhou Province.
sentences.chinese: 龙船节，是黔东南清水江上苗族人民最盛大的的节日。

sentences.english: The customs of Li and Miao Minority attract the tourists from both at home and abroad.
sentences.chinese: 黎苗族的风尚吸收了来自国内外的很多游客。

sentences.english: The women from the Miao ethnic group dye their fabrics with natural colorants.
sentences.chinese: 苗族妇女用天然染色剂给她们的布料染色。

sentences.english: One of the New Year's celebration activities for the Miao nation(This photo and caption were submitted to My Shot.)
sentences.chinese: 苗族的一个新年庆祝活动。

sentences.english: Her name is Long Gan, Miao Tribe, twelve years old, second grade at Wen Xian Elementary School.
sentences.chinese: 她是龙根，苗族，今年十二岁，文贤三小二年级学生。

sentences.english: Ancient folk song and long poem are the most representative works of Hmong Folk Literature.
sentences.chinese: 苗族民间文学中最具代表性的是古歌与民间长诗。

sentences.english: She returned home and began to live among the ethnic Miao.
sentences.chinese: 她回到家乡，开始和苗族人民生活在一起。
